name: Ignion
description:
Transmit the fire that lives in you, and bring light to the world!

Ignion is 2D platform game in which you are Ignion, the first light to come alive after a long time of darkness. 

Your life lasts only for a few seconds, to continue your journey you have to explode and transmit your fire to the next asleep Ignion you find.

Go fast and challenge your friends! You can compare your time and how many Ignions you took to complete each level in an online arcade like ranking! 

CONTROLS: 

Space: Jump

X : Explode
